reviewText: Elizabeth Montgomery the star of the long running TV show Bewitched stars in Deadline Assault. She plays a recently divorced newswoman whose world is shattered by a brutal gang attack. The injuries subside, but Montgomery must also heal her emotional wounds.  She reassess her liberal attitudes towards the rights of criminals and finds that she is incapable of rational thought under the circumstances; transforming into a vengeful bigot. 1979; 90 minutes.
